section.name: QML engine
section.chapter_description: The QML engine enables nelson programs to display and manipulate graphical content using Qt's QML framework.

keyword.name: nelsonObject
keyword.description: nelson object callable from QML.

keyword.name: qml_addimportpath
keyword.description: Adds path as directory where the qml engine searches for installed modules.

keyword.name: qml_addpluginpath
keyword.description: Adds path as directory where the qml engine searches for native plugins.

keyword.name: qml_clearcomponentcache
keyword.description: Clears the engine's internal component cache..

keyword.name: qml_collectgarbage
keyword.description: Runs the Qml garbage collector.

keyword.name: qml_createqquickview
keyword.description: Load a QML file and creates a window.

keyword.name: qml_demos
keyword.description: QML demos.

keyword.name: qml_evaluatefile
keyword.description: Evaluates a js file.

keyword.name: qml_evaluatestring
keyword.description: Evaluates a js string.

keyword.name: qml_importpathlist
keyword.description: Returns the list of directories where the engine searches for installed modules in a URL-based directory structure.

keyword.name: qml_loadfile
keyword.description: Load a QML file.

keyword.name: qml_loadstring
keyword.description: Load a QML string.

keyword.name: qml_offlinestoragepath
keyword.description: Get the Property contains the directory to store offline user data.

keyword.name: qml_pluginpathlist
keyword.description: Returns the list of directories where the engine searches for native plugins for imported modules.

keyword.name: qml_setofflinestoragepath
keyword.description: Set the Property contains the directory to store offline user data.

keyword.name: QObject_classname
keyword.description: Returns class name of an QObject handle.

keyword.name: QObject_findchildren
keyword.description: Returns all children of this object with the given name.

keyword.name: QObject_get
keyword.description: Retrieve a property value from an QObject handle.

keyword.name: QObject_iswidgettype
keyword.description: Returns true if the QObject is a widget.

keyword.name: QObject_iswindowtype
keyword.description: Returns true if the QObject is a window.

keyword.name: QObject_methodsignature
keyword.description: Returns the signature of a method of a QObject handle.

keyword.name: QObject_root
keyword.description: QObject root object.

keyword.name: QObject_set
keyword.description: Set a property value of an QObject handle (set).

keyword.name: QObject_undefine
keyword.description: Undefine a dynamic property of a QObject handle.

keyword.name: QObject_used
keyword.description: Returns list of current used QObject handle.

keyword.name: qt_constant
keyword.description: Returns Qt constant value.

keyword.name: qt_version
keyword.description: Returns Qt version used.
